title: I have a completely see-through lace bodysuit. How do I wear it in public?

og.title: I have a completely see-through lace bodysuit. How do I wear it in public?
og.description:
Answer (1 of 44): First, the bodysuit on the picture is beautiful. Congratulations if it is yours !

Now : a bodysuit is a piece of underwear, of lingerie. Sheer, or not. In this respect, it is made and designed to be worn directly on the skin. There are much sheerer ones, you know. There are als...
